summary: This document is an email correspondence discussing salary negotiations and market conditions. Jeffery Edwards advises the recipient on how to approach a salary increase request, emphasizing the importance of not accepting a reduction in salary despite market challenges. The communication reflects the financial pressures and personal dynamics between the individuals involved.

persons.name: Jeffery Edwards
persons.context: Jeffery Edwards is providing advice on salary negotiations and market conditions in an email correspondence.

persons.name: Jamie
persons.context: Jamie is mentioned as the person for whom the recipient is determining their salary expectations.

persons.name: Jes
persons.context: Jes is the recipient of the email who is seeking advice on how much to request for their salary this year.

connections.description: Jeffery Edwards is advising Jes on salary negotiations.
Jes is discussing salary expectations with Jamie, their employer.

keyFacts: Jeffery Edwards advises Jes on negotiating a salary increase to $25 million.
Jes's business is expected to decline by around 15% this year.
The email emphasizes the importance of not accepting a salary reduction despite market challenges.
